short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you quickly obtain the markdown link of the current webpage with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool is especially useful when you are writing or editing TiDB documentation.

To copy the markdown link, you can either click the extension icon or use a keyboard shortcut. The default keyboard shortcut is <kbd>Alt + Q</kbd> (<kbd>âŒƒ + Q</kbd> for macOS). You can change the shortcut from the browser's extension settings.
